Topic.Title: Become a Warrior Cat! Play the game now!

Posts.EditableText:
Hey, guys! I just made a really fun new game that allows you to see what you would be like if you were a warrior cat by asking some questions like what you look like, what your favorite color is, what your name is, etc. If you want to see what your name, clan, personality, and appearance would be if YOU were a warrior cat, click the link! Remember to leave me a review, and have fun! Thanks!

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/2ct6wbpzh0ehpwc1o0ljuw/create-your-own-warrior-cat
